cause.description:
Millions of children are diagnosed with early onset bipolar disorder. Millions more are currently misdiagnosed with other disorders. This is because many people, including professionals within the medical community, believe that this disorder cannot exist in children! It is very real and it does exist! Please donate and help fund research that will aid in someday finding a cure!
1. Help find a cure for Bipolar Disorder in Kids!
cause.mission: Research to find a cure for bipolar disorder in kids!
cause.name: Juvenile Bipolar Research (DUPLICATE - DO NOT USE - FIND Juvenile Bipolar Research FOUNDATION)!!!
